entry.title: New release for HortusFox: v3.1
entry.content:
Version 3.1 of HortusFox

Changelog - Manage custom plant attributes - REST API feature - Radiobuttons for boolean values - Fix timezone error for weather forecast - Clickable dashboard stats - Many more health states - New default plant attribute: annual - Image upload from camera - Show plant IDs of plants in lists - Toggleable visibility of default plant attributes - Option to delete finished tasks

entry.title: New release for HortusFox: v3.2
entry.content:
Version 3.2 of HortusFox

Changelog - Global custom plant attributes - Plant specific history log for each plant - Bulk watering, fertilising and repotting - Fixed checkboxes not applying in search - Fixed apostrophes causing errors in plant attributes - Fixed failed creation of manifest.json in docker environment - Show plant IDs in last AORU section if enabled - Fixed error when trying to fetch log entires of unassociated users - Fixed history error when using MySQL instead of MariaDB - Improved backup feature - Upgraded to PHP 8.3 - Various other improvements and fixes

entry.title: New release for HortusFox: v3.3
entry.content:
Version 3.3 of HortusFox

Changelog

  • QR code for inventory items
  • Localization improvements
  • New language: Polish
  • Use external image resources
  • Location suggestions for inventory items
  • Allow setting different invitation URL
  • Fix further apostrophe errors
  • Initial testing structure
  • Updated underlying framework
  • Small bugfixes and improvements

entry.title: New release for HortusFox: v3.4
entry.content:
Version 3.4 of HortusFox

Changelog

  • Community feature

entry.title: New release for HortusFox: v3.5
entry.content:
Version 3.5 of HortusFox

Changelog

  • Added proxy authentication
  • Fixed deprecation warnings in input fields
  • Added location specific log
  • Fix listly migration in docker environment
  • Styling for e-mails via themes
  • Updated dependencies
  • New logo and other graphical assets
  • Custom host for image sharing
  • Allow searching for custom attributes
  • Custom actions for location specific updates
  • Fix docker timezone error
  • Many more API endpoints
  • Various improvements and bugfixes
